articles.title: Foreign Guests Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Centre of the Cuban Workers led by General Secretary Ulises Guilarte De Nacimiento and other foreigners Sunday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					 The guests paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: KCNA Reports about Signal Successes in Various Fields in Early March
articles.content:
KCNA Reports about Signal Successes in Various Fields in Early March
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency Saturday said in a report that the industrial production in the first ten days of March when the 70-day campaign of loyalty is under way grew 1.2 times as compared with the corresponding period of last year.
					 According to the report, production in the vanguard and basic industrial fields of the national economy including electric power, coal, metal and railway transport sharply rose.
					
					 Thermal power plants and hydro-power stations across the country have over-fulfilled their daily quotas.
					
					 The production plan of the Ministry of Coal Industry for ten days in March was over-fulfilled 13 percent.
					
					 The workers of the Chollima Steel Complex boosted the production of rolled steel 32 percent.
					
					 A dynamic drive for increased iron and steel production is under way in metallurgical bases across the country including the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex.
					
					 The Jaeryong Mine increased daily quotas over 1.5 times on an average, thus taking the lead among the iron ore mines in Musan, Unryul, Thaethan and other areas.
					
					 The Ministry of Railways, all the railway bureaus and sub-bureaus over-fulfilled main freight haulage plan.
					
					 The increased production in the vanguard sectors of the national economy injected vitality into major industrial fields such as machine-building, chemical, building material and mining industries and forestry.
					
					 The custom-built equipment for different fields of the national economy were turned out and the production of nonferrous metal ore, chemical fertilizers, cement, sheet glass, timber, etc. radically increased.
					
					 The Taean Heavy Machine Complex completed the production of generating equipment in a matter of two months and sent them to the construction site of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 on Mar. 10.
					
					 The Ministry of Machine Industry increased the production of thermal power generating equipment 1.5 times.
					
					 Mines under the Phosphate Fertilizer Industry Management Bureau honored its plan at 150 percent.
					
					 The workers of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex hit the goal for the production of Juche fertilizers.
					
					 The workers and technicians of the Sangwon Cement Complex are working hard to surpass the peak production year again this year.
					
					 The Sunchon Cement Complex, the Chonnaeri Cement Factory and the Sunghori Cement Factory boosted the production over 10 percent.
					
					 Many forestry stations and pit prop production stations also honored their first quarterly and yearly timber production quotas.
					
					 The production of homemade fertilizers and their transport, tractor overhauling and maintenance and other farming preparations are nearing completion thanks to the devoted drive of agricultural workers across the country.
					
					 The fishery officials and workers over-fulfilled their production plan of the Ministry of Fisheries for ten days 21 percent.
					
					 The field of light industry over-fulfilled the production plans for textiles, knitwear and shoes.
					
					 In the field of textile industry hundreds of workers honored the half yearly and first quarterly quotas and famous products and goods favored by the people are on the increase.
					
					 Many major construction projects are making rapid progress.
					
					 A lot of young people volunteer to work in the hard and labor-consuming fields.
					
					 Across the country hundreds of workers honored their yearly plans, at least 3,600 people carried out the first half yearly plans and more than 15,400 people hit the first quarterly goal.
					
					 A lot of members of the women's union are giving helping hands to builders in power stations, workers of coal and ore mines. War veterans, honorary party members and pensioners have turned out in the 70-day campaign in South Phyongan Province and other parts of the country to fully demonstrate the noble traits of our society advancing with the might of single-minded unity.

articles.title: Technical Innovations Brisk at Silk Mills
articles.content:
Technical Innovations Brisk at Silk Mills
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Silk mills in the DPRK strive to normalize production with homegrown facilities and locally available raw materials.
					 The Sericulture and Silk Industrial Bureau has set the normalization of production as a primary task to be carried out in the on-going 70-day campaign and encourages silk mills to push ahead with technical innovation.
					
					 As a result, homemade reels are introduced in production and manufacturing processes have been steadily upgraded at different silk mills, including Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, Pakchon Silk Mill and Nyongbyon Silk Mill.
					
					 Meanwhile, it has been pushed forward at those mills to begin home-production of imported accessories.

articles.title: Preparations for Fruit Farming Hurried up
articles.content:
Preparations for Fruit Farming Hurried up
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Preparations for fruit farming have been accelerated in the DPRK.
					 According to data available, pruning nears its completion and the production of substitute agrochemicals is carried out at 90 percent, while big efforts have been paid to production and carriage of manure.
					
					 Taking the lead in the work are Ryongjon, Onchon, Hwangju, Samchon, Tongrim, Unryul and Sinchon fruit farms and Toksong apple farm.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Is Fated to Meet Doom: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Is Fated to Meet Doom: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of south Korea is making desperate efforts to carry out the "operation for advancing into Pyongyang" accompanied by surprise landing on the territory of the DPRK under the codename of Ssangyong drill as part of rehearsals for invading the north, backed by the U.S. This is the last-ditch efforts of those whose days are numbered.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an article Sunday. It goes on:
					
					 The above-said saber-rattling being staged by the Park group of traitors together with the U.S. is nothing but its last resort to bridge over the worst ruling crisis into which the group has been thrown after being cursed and forsaken by the public for its policy of confrontation with the compatriots in the north and unpopular rule.
					
					 The anachronistic confrontation policy that has been pursued by the present puppet ruling forces is bound to go totally bankrupt, throwing them into a tight corner.
					
					 As there occur frequent quarrels in the family going to a ruin, scrambles for power are getting fiercer among puppet ruling quarters against the backdrop of mounting anti-"government" actions.
					
					 It is the trite method of the successive puppet ruling forces to seek a way out of crisis by means of confrontation with the north and war drumbeats against it.
					
					 No one in the world would be frightened by the last-ditch efforts of those on the death beds, going reckless, seized with day-dream.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is fated to go to a ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Moves to Fabricate Anti-DPRK Confrontation Law
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Moves to Fabricate Anti-DPRK Confrontation Law
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The group of the south Korean puppet Intelligence Service (IS) in a recent urgent meeting for cyber security loudly touted the fiction about "cyber terror attack from the north." In the meantime, a spokesman for Chongwadae shouted hoarse that the "cyber threat from the north is escalating" and "'the bill on preventing cyber terror' should be passed at any cost." The floor leader of the "Saenuri Party" cried out for "making preparations to prevent the cyber terror and bringing up for discussion the increasing authority of the speaker of the 'National Assembly'".
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group whose days are drawing nearer is pulling up the north in a bid to prolong their remaining days while putting their crimes on the shelf. This is nothing but a vicious confrontation racket to cook up the above-said law by orchestrating another anti-DPRK conspiratorial case.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the "bill on preventing cyber terror" is no more than a fascist one aimed to brutally suppress an elementary democratic freedom and rights of the south Korean people.
					
					 That is why south Korean people from all walks of life are branding and denouncing the "bill" as the one for reinforcing the IS and the one for inspecting civilians.
					
					 Forces of opposition parties are strongly chiding the moves, saying that if the bill is railroaded through the NA, not a single person would be free from the surveillance and inspection of the IS in cyber space.
					
					 The witch of Chongwadae is bound to meet a tragic painful end in face of stern punishment by the army and people of the DPRK as she bereft of any ability to control ensuing troubles persistently resorts to abnormal and reckless provocations backed by her American master.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Drills under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Drills under Fire
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces kicked off the Ssangyong drills simulating a landing operation against the north and are openly advertising it as the climax of the OPLAN 5015 aimed at striking the supreme headquarters and major core facilities of the north through an "operation for advancing into Pyongyang" and at "bringing down the social system of the north" accompanied by a surprise landing on its territory.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Sunday says:
					
					 This goes to prove that their war hysteria against the north has already gone beyond the tolerance limit and they are going reckless in carrying out their scenario to ignite a war against it while Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises are under way.
					
					 It is the resolute stand of the army and people of the DPRK that the reckless saber-rattling of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers should not be overlooked any longer, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the war fighting mode and the unshakable will of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK for retaliating against the enemy to counter the enemy's anti-DPRK landing drills aimed at "storming Pyongyang" with an operation to liberate the whole of south Korea including Seoul, and the enemy's "high-density strike" tactics with ultra-precision blitzkrieg of Korean style.
					
					 No one would be able to survive the unpredicted retaliatory strikes of our revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 If the enemies dare attack, underestimating our revolutionary armed forces' mode of counter-action and capability, they will face the most foolish and miserable consequences of digging their own graves from that moment.

articles.title: Victims of Sexual Slavery Urge Japanese Authorities to Make Apology and Reparation
articles.content:
Victims of Sexual Slavery Urge Japanese Authorities to Make Apology and Reparation
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army are staging actions in the U.S., demanding the Japanese government make an official apology and reparation for the past crimes, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 At a press conference outside the building of the New York City Office on March 8 south Korean woman Ri Yong Su said that she can never accept the "agreement" reached between Japan and south Korea, declaring it null and void.
					
					 The victims have waged actions to force Japan to make official apology and reparation over the past two decades but Japan still denies them, she deplored.
					
					 At a press conference at the UN Headquarters in New York she recalled how she was subject to all kinds of shame after being taken as a sexual slave for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 Kil Won Ok, another victim of sexual slavery, at a press conference held in Washington on the same day said that the south Korean and Japanese authorities made an "agreement" without consultation with the living victims. She held that the victims cannot accept it.
					
					 Yun Mi Hyang, permanent representative of the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea, stressed that the issue of sexual slavery can be said to have been solved only when the victims accept what has been done as an expression of apology and reparation.

articles.title: Candlelight Action Protests against War Drills in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Action Protests against War Drills in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News, organizations of different circles in south Korea held a candlelight rally in Seoul on March 11, demanding a stop to frantic war drills kicked off by the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers. They included the People's Action for Peace against War, the preparatory committee of the Solidarity for Peace against War and the Workers' Solidarity.
					 At the rally the speakers said that the Ssangyong drill being staged in Phohang is not a mere landing drill but a military rehearsal aimed at "occupying Pyongyang."
					
					 They protested against the war exercises aimed to mount a preemptive attack on the north.
					
					 They declared that they would gather in Phohang on March 12 when the Ssangyong drill is supposed to reach its height to stage an action against the saber-rattling.

articles.title: S. Korean Civic and Public Organizations Makes Public Peace Declaration
articles.content:
S. Korean Civic and Public Organizations Makes Public Peace Declaration
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations in Pusan of south Korea waged a struggle for peace against war, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 The Pusan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, the Pusan Citizens' Solidarity and the Pusan People's Solidarity held a meeting on March 11 and made public a declaration on peace of the civic and public organizations in Pusan.
					
					 The war-like atmosphere is mounting on the Korean peninsula due to the largest-ever U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises involving a large number of nuclear war means, the declaration said, and went on:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye "government" closed the Kaesong Industrial Zone as part of its intensified hostile policy toward the DPRK and is taking measures for escalating tension, while talking about "sanctions".
					
					 The civic and public organizations in Pusan will turn out in the struggle for peace against war irrespective of idea and political view.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Slammed for Fabricating Fascist Law
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Slammed for Fabricating Fascist Law
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Society for Human Rights Movement, the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society and other organizations of south Korea issued a statement on March 8 denouncing traitor Park Geun Hye for working to fake up more fascist laws.
					 The statement recalled that Park is scheming to institute the "law on preventing cyber terror" in the wake of the "anti-terrorism law" and the "law on human rights in the north".
					
					 No sooner had Park said at a meeting of chief secretaries of Chongwadae that the "bill on preventing cyber terror" should be passed through the "National Assembly" than the Intelligence Service and the "Saenuri Party" vied with each other to claim that the "north is threatening cyber space", the statement charged.
					
					 It demanded the "president" stop the pressure on instituting the "law on preventing cyber terror".

articles.title: Foreign News Introduce Tree-planting in DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign News Introduce Tree-planting in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign media introduced tree-planting in the DPRK.
					 The Slovak internet homepage kldr.sk on March 2 posted an article titled "70th Tree-planting Day" together with photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un planting trees.
					
					 It said that Kim Il Sung climbed Moran Hill on Mar. 2, 1946 to plant trees with the farseeing plan to turn the motherland destroyed under the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists into a thickly wooded green paradise of the people. Since then the DPRK marks the day as Tree-planting Day.
					
					 It noted Kim Jong Il with ardent patriotism devoted his all to opening the new history of greenery of the motherland true to the farseeing plan of the President.
					
					 The wishes of the preceding leaders are now being realized under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, it added.
					
					 TASS on Mar. 4 said that the people of all ages irrespective of sex in the DPRK took part in the work for turning the country to thick woodland on the Tree-planting Day.
					
					 A U.S. website and Reuters on Mar. 3 carried similar reports about a campaign to turn the country into a thick woodland being staged in the DPRK.

articles.title: Figure of Regional Body Condemns UNSC's Unreasonable "Sanctions Resolution" against DPRK
articles.content:
Figure of Regional Body Condemns UNSC's Unreasonable "Sanctions Resolution" against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea, issued a statement on March 6 in denunciation of the "sanctions resolution" adopted by the UN Security Council against the DPRK.
					 He said:
					
					 The U.S., taken aback by the DPRK's first H-bomb test and successful launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4, fabricated the "sanctions resolution" against it by abusing the name of the UN.
					
					 The U.S. is talking about the effectiveness of the "sanctions resolution" after fabricating it and Japan and other forces kowtowing to the U.S. are dancing to its tune but in vain.
					
					 The UN "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK is a criminal document bereft of impartiality.
					
					 The DPRK has never recognized such resolution.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers will be shocked by the DPRK's tough countermeasures.
					
					 The DPRK will steadily advance toward the future.

articles.title: DPRK Government Spokesman's Statement Supported by Ecuadorian Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK Government Spokesman's Statement Supported by Ecuadorian Organizations
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification, the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador and the Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People issued a joint statement on March 5 in denunciation of the utterly unreasonable "sanctions resolution" of the UN Security Council against the DPRK.
					 Expressing full support for the statement made by a spokesman for the DPRK government, the joint statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and its followers, by abusing the name of the UNSC, cooked up another "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK, taking issue with its H-bomb test and successful launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					
					 The UN should impose sanctions upon the U.S. hell-bent on the moves to stifle the dignified DPRK while kicking off war drills involving huge forces every year.
					
					 The world conscience and progressives are hardly repressing their resentment at the hostile act of the U.S.-led UNSC against the DPRK 
					
					 The Korean people will never be scared by the "sanctions resolution" fabricated by the U.S.

articles.title: French, Slovenian Organizations Urge U.S. and S. Korea to Stop Their Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
French, Slovenian Organizations Urge U.S. and S. Korea to Stop Their Joint Military Exercises
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- French, Slovenian organizations issued statements on March 2 and 7 in denunciation of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces to mount a preemptive nuclear strike on the DPRK.
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association said:
					
					 We urge the U.S. and south Korea to stop their joint military exercises being staged amid the tensions created on the Korean peninsula due to the "resolution on sanctions" adopted by the UN Security Council against the DPRK.
					
					 Western media are shutting their eyes on the war rehearsals' adverse impact on the dangerous situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The recent UNSC's "sanctions resolution" is unprecedented in the light of its vicious nature.
					
					 The unprecedented war games involving huge forces are aimed to occupy the DPRK.
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula is on the brink of a war.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea, stop the joint military drills at once!
					
					 The Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association in its statement extended full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for defending the country's sovereignty and nation's right to existence.

articles.title: U.S. and Its Followers Should Be Thrown into Dumping Ground of History: German Organization
articles.content:
U.S. and Its Followers Should Be Thrown into Dumping Ground of History: German Organization
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its stooges should be thrown into the dumping ground of history.
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said this in its statement on March 7.
					
					 The statement extended full support to the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK government and the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry bitterly denouncing the "sanctions resolution" of the UN Security Council against the DPRK, and said:
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are igniting wars of aggression across the world to meet their interests in disregard of international law, and inflicting misfortune and pain upon humankind.
					
					 They are shamelessly calling for "observing" international law.
					
					 The UNSC has been reduced to a tool for justifying the U.S. and its followers' aggression against independent countries.
					
					 Human conscience is ridiculing the UNSC.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany urges the UN to probe the truth behind the U.S. and its followers' violations of international law and impose sanctions upon them.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Denounces Park Geun Hye's Serious Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Denounces Park Geun Hye's Serious Human Rights Abuses
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website on March 6 an article terming Park Geun Hye of south Korea the worst human rights abuser and kingpin of terrorism.
					 The article recalled that the Park group pressed the "National Assembly" into fabricating the "law on human rights in the north" and the "anti-terrorism law" aimed at inciting confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north despite the unanimous rebuff and condemnation of all Koreans.
					
					 This is the thrice-cursed provocation to the Korean people and a hideous criminal act of driving the north-south relations to the brink of a war, it noted, and went on:
					
					 There is no "human rights" problem in the DPRK, the people-centered society in which the dignity and rights of the popular masses are guaranteed on the highest level and they are regarded as Heaven and the people's dreams and ideals are becoming realities.
					
					 It is, indeed, a politically-motivated charade and open mockery at the public opinion at home and abroad to fabricate the "law on human rights in the north" on the basis of lies faked up by a handful of human scum and take issue with the DPRK over its "human rights".
					
					 Park Geun Hye has neither qualifications nor face to talk about human rights and terrorism as she reduced south Korea to the worst tundra of human rights and a complete colony of the U.S. in which man-killing and terrorism are rampant.

articles.title: Slovenian Organization Criticizes U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces' War Drills against DPRK
articles.content:
Slovenian Organization Criticizes U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces' War Drills against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association issued a statement on March 9 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces for kicking off the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military drills aimed at a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We, for the sake of world peace and security, denounce the military threat being posed by the U.S. and its followers to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint military drills are pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the worst phase.
					
					 The DPRK is an invincible military power.
					
					 The U.S. should not resort to fresh military provocations on the peninsula but opt for concluding a peace treaty with the DPRK.

articles.title: ACNC informa sobre produccion industrial en primeros diez dias de marzo
articles.content:
ACNC informa sobre produccion industrial en primeros diez dias de marzo
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea informo el dia 12 de que en la campana de 70 dias de la fidelidad, durante los primeros diez dias de marzo la produccion industrial se aumento 1.2 veces en comparacion con el mismo tiempo del ano pasado en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Segun ella, se elevo considerablemente la produccion en los dominios prioritarios y la rama de la industria basica de la economia nacional incluyendo la electricidad, el carbon, la metalurgia y el transporte ferroviario.
					
					Los puestos de mando a todos niveles para la campana de 70 dias desde el centro hasta la unidad de base organizaron con escrupulosidad la operacion y el mando sobre la produccion alternativa y el transporte centralizado concentrando las fuerzas en los objetos principales.
					
					Las entidades artisticas y los grupos de agitacion economica de la capital y las localidades desarrollaron en el terreno las actividades de propaganda y agitacion economicas y otras labores politico-ideologicas incluyendo la propaganda radial, la visual y la de conferencia en todas las partes del pais.
					
					Las centrales termoelectricas e hidroelectricas del pais sobrecumplieron el plan de 10 dias.
					
					En las cuencas carboniferas de la zona occidental se produjeron mas cada dia miles de toneladas de carbon.
					
					El Ministerio de Industria Carbonifera sobrecumplio en 113% el plan productivo de 10 dias. Se elevaron los resultados de la perforacion principal y la preparatoria mas que el plan y se prepararon unos cientos de galerias de explotacion de carbon de reserva.
					
					Los obreros del Complejo de Acero Chollima elevaron en 132% los resultados de la produccion de materiales de acero laminados.
					
					La clase obrera del Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae registro el maximo resultado despues del inicio de la produccion de hierro Juche fundiendolo el dia primero dos veces mas que el pasado en el alto horno de inyeccion de oxigeno y asi se desarrollo con dinamismo la campana para el aumento de produccion de los materiales de hierro y acero en las bases metalurgicas de todas las partes del pais.
					
					En medio de la campana para alcanzar y aprender las unidades ejemplares e intercambiar las experiencias adquiridas en las minas de hierro de Musan, Unryul y Thaethan, la mina de Jaeryong esta al frente del suministro de los minerales concentrados de hierro a las fabricas metalurgicas elevando mas de 1.5 veces como promedio la proporcion del cumplimiento del plan.
					
					El Ministerio del Ferrocarril y todas las direcciones y sucursales ferroviarias sobrecumplieron el plan del transporte de carga importante.
					
					El aumento de la produccion en los dominios prioritarios de la economia nacional infundio vigor a las ramas industriales importantes en conjunto incluyendo la mecanica, la quimica, la de materiales de construccion, la extractiva y la de silvicultura.
					
					Asi termino la produccion de los equipos encargados para suministrar a varias ramas de la economia nacional, se incremento la produccion de los minerales de metales no ferrosos y se aumento mas que el plan la produccion de los indices importantes, entre ellos, el abono quimico, el cemento, la placa de vidrio y el madero. 
					
					El Complejo de Maquinaria Pesada de Taean termino en dos meses la produccion, prevista en 5 meses, de los equipos generadores entre otros el rotor, el estator y el transformador necesarios a la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica No.3 Heroes Jovenes Paektusan y los envio el dia 10 al destino.
					
					En el Ministerio de Industria Mecanica aumentaron en 1.5 veces la produccion de las instalaciones de generacion termoelectrica.
					
					La Direccion de la Industria de Abono Fosforico cumplio en 1.5 veces su plan.
					
					Los obreros del Complejo de Fertilizantes de Hungnam alcanzaron el plan productivo de abono del Juche para el periodo de los primeros dias y los del Complejo de Cemento de Sangwon registran saltos para volver a romper este ano tambien el record de produccion anual como lo hicieron en el ano pasado.
					
					El Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon, la Fabrica de Cemento de Chonnaeri y la Fabrica de Cemento de Sunghori incrementaron en mas de 110% la produccion.
					
					Numerosas empresas forestales y de produccion de entibo de todas las localidades cumplieron con anticipacion el plan anual de produccion de madero.
					
					Gracias a los esfuerzos abnegados de los trabajadores agricolas del pais llegaron a etapa final los preparativos generales para el cultivo agricola entre otros la produccion y transporte de estiercoles, reparacion  y el arreglo de tractores.
					
					Durante 10 dias, la produccion nacional de fertilizante Hukbosan y de abonos microbiologicos se aumento en 1.7 veces mayores y 2.8 veces, respectivamente, y el trabajo de recubrimiento con la tierra fertil, en mas de 1.3 veces.
					
					Los trabajadores agricolas de la ciudad de Pyongyang y de las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur y del Norte dan acicate a la siembra primaveral de trigo y cebada, cumpliendo en mas de 180% el plan diario.
					
					Los funcionarios y los pescadores de la rama pesquera de distintas localidades cumplieron en 121% el plan de produccion de pescados de diez dias.
					
					Las fabricas de industria ligera del pais sobrecumplieron la produccion de telas, ropas tejidos y zapatos.
					
					En la rama de industria textil salieron centenares de cumplidores de plan de primer semestre y primer trimestre y se aumentaron las variedades de los articulos y mercancias famosos.
					
					Se impulsan con rapidez las construcciones de numerosos objetivos importantes.
					
					Muchos jovenes se incorporaron voluntariamente a las ramas mas dificiles y cientos de ellos cumplieron el plan de la economia nacional, 3 mil 600, el plan de primer semestre y 15 mil 400, el plan de primer trimestre.
					
					Incontables integrantes de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea dieron asistencia voluntaria a las centrales, minas carboniferas, minas y lugares de construccion y en todas las localidades inclusive provincia de Hwanghae del Sur se movilizaron los veteranos de guerra, los militantes honorarios del partido y los jubilados en la campana de 70 dias, poniendo de pleno manifiesto el rasgo de la sociedad coreana que marcha con el poderio de la unidad monolitica.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras de invencion de ley conflictiva anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras de invencion de ley conflictiva anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hace unos dias, los agentes del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea convocaron la "reunion emergente de medida de seguridad cibernetica", ocasion en la cual hablaron sin fundamento del rumor del "ataque de terrorismo cibernetico del Norte". Y el vocero de Chongwadae dijo que "se eleva la intensidad de la amenaza cibernetica del Norte" y "hay que aprobar sin falta la ´ley de prevencion de terror cibernetico´". Tambien, el representante parlamentario del "Partido Saenuri" disparateo de los "preparativos para prevenir el terror cibernetico" y la "presentacion de la autoridad del presidente de la ´Asamblea Nacional´".
					La acusacion a la RPDC de la banda de Park a fin de mantener su vida restante es una perversa locura conflictiva destinada a fabricar a toda costa la "ley de prevencion de terror cibernetico"
					
					Asi subraya Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 13 y continua:
					
					Lo mas problematico es que esta "ley" fascista extermina la libertad democratica y los derechos humanos basicos de los  habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					Ahora, los habitantes de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea se oponen a esta "ley" acusandola de "ley de recrudecimiento del SNI" y "ley de inspeccion de civiles".
					
					Las fuerzas de los partidos opositores lo protestan fuertemente diciendo que "ninguna persona sera libre" de la vigilancia y la inspeccion del SNI en el espacio cibernetico en el caso de que se aprobara en la "Asamblea Nacional".
					
					La mandataria de Chongwadae que recurre a la anormal e imprudente provocacion confiando en su amo estadounidense, sufrira el destino mas amargo por el castigo rotundo de los militares y civiles de la RPDC.

articles.title: Arruinamiento es destino inevitable de Park Geun Hey, destaca Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Arruinamiento es destino inevitable de Park Geun Hey, destaca Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- Ahora, la banda de Park Geun Hye, que desarrolla junto con Estados Unidos los ejercicios de guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, maniobra desesperadamente para practicar la "operacion de avance a Pyongyang" mediante el  desembarco asaltante contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea bajo el rotulo del simulacro Ssangryong.
					En un articulo individual divulgado el dia 13, Rodong Sinmun lo califico del ultimo coletazo de quienes estan en agonias y continuo:
					
					Las presentes maniobras militares son ultimos esfuerzos de los traidores a la nacion que estan en peor crisis de gobernacion al ser repudiados por el pueblo debido a las politicas de confrontacion fratricida y anti-populares.
					
					La anacronica politica de confrontacion fratricida de las actuales fuerzas titeres en Poder esta en visperas del fracaso y los traidores estan en aprieto.
					
					Se torna cada dia mas furiosa la pugna interna de las fuerzas dominantes por la conquista del Poder.
					
					Es el metodo rutinario de los gobernadores titeres buscar la salida de la crisis en la confrontacion nacional y los alborotos de provocacion de guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					Nadie sera sorprendido ante las desesperaciones de los moribundos.
					
					El arruinamiento es el destino inevitable de la banda de Park.

articles.title: Minju Joson advierte a EE.UU. y banda titere surcoreana
articles.content:
Minju Joson advierte a EE.UU. y banda titere surcoreana
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los imperialistas yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos hablan abiertamente de que es el climax de OPLAN 5015 el simulacro Ssangryong, cuyo objetivo es el "derrocamiento del regimen" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tras atacar la Suprema Direccion y las principales instalaciones medulares mediante la "operacion de asalto a Pyongyang" en acompanamiento de desembarco sorpresivo.
					Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 13, revela que la situacion muestra que la histeria anti-RPDC de los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos ya paso el limite y ellos se entregan sin prudencia a provocar a toda costa la guerra anti-RPDC en el periodo de simulacro de Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16.
					
					Ya no pueden observar mas con brazos cruzados el imprudente escandalo belico, esto es la posicion rotunda de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, senala el comentario y continua:
					
					Contestar al simulacro de desembarco para el "ataque a Pyongyang" con la operacion de liberacion de Seul y el resto de todo el territorio surcoreano y a la tactica de "golpe a modo de pinzas" con el golpe relampagueante, sorpresivo y superpreciso a estilo coreano, esto es el modo de guerra e invariable voluntad de venganza de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					Nadie puede salvarse del imprevisible golpe de represalia de nuestro poderoso ejercito revolucionario.
					
					Si los enemigos se atreven a atacarnos despreciando el modo y capacidad de enfrentamiento de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, seran destruidos tragicamente en medio de la pesadilla mas dolorosa.
